lnb-leg:preamble.lnb-leg:para1: The Secretary of State, in exercise of the powers conferred by section 50(9A) and (9B) of the British Nationality Act 1981, makes the following Regulations:

lnb-leg:provision.lnb-leg:para1: [For the purposes of section 50(9A)(c) of the British Nationality Act 1981, the prescribed requirement as to proof of paternity is that the person must satisfy the Secretary of State that he is the natural father of the child.]

core:comment.core:para: Substituted by SI 2015/1615, regs 2, 3. Date in force: 10 September 2015: see SI 2015/1615, reg 1; for transitional provision see reg 5.
